arts.ttl: Late Nadiem Amiri penalty earns Mainz a draw at Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Nadiem Amiri's 90th-minute penalty secured Mainz a 1-1 draw against Wolfsburg at the Volkswagen Arena, with his strike cancelling out Aaron Zehnter's opener. As the match wore on, Mainz's pressure intensified and, in the 79th minute, they went agonisingly close when Kohr's header from Amiri's corner struck the inside of the post.

arts.ttl: Mainz earn deserved point against homesick Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Mainz secured their first point of the season away in Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: VfL Wolfsburg vs. 1. FSV Mainz 05 preview: Wölfe look to start 2-for-2 in new campaign
arts.sum: Paul Simonis' VfL Wolfsburg (1-0-0, 4th) look to remain undefeated through two matches, as they host 1. FSV Mainz 05 (0-0-1, 14th) at the Volkswagen Arena on Sunday (15:30 CET).
